The new guidance limits which infants should receive the vaccine, moving away from the previous policy of vaccinating all newborns. d4c1f01e0f1a2e5f93f404d5a60561f6::2025-1.summary: On December 5, 2025, Netflix agreed to acquire Warner Bros. Discovery’s film, television, and streaming businesses—including HBO, HBO Max, DC Studios, and major franchises—for approximately $82.7 billion. The deal follows a competitive bidding process and excludes Warner Bros. Discovery’s cable and sports networks, which will be spun off before closing. Critics warn the merger could reduce competition and consumer choice in Hollywood. Netflix will honor Warner Bros.' existing theatrical contracts through 2029.

d93e74f221bb9a689991d339c221d29f::2025-1.summary: On December 5, 2025, The New York Times filed a lawsuit against Perplexity AI, alleging the company illegally copied and distributed millions of the newspaper's articles without permission. Perplexity AI also faces similar lawsuits from Dow Jones and the New York Post over its use of copyrighted content. The legal actions aim to push AI firms toward licensing agreements that compensate publishers. The cases are ongoing.
